original_title: Earth's Trial: Debunking Climate Change Myths
overview: In this courtroom drama, Mother Earth is sent to trial for the destruction she has brought upon humanity. The audience is faced with a moral dilemma of whether Earth should be held responsible for the loss of lives and habitat from extreme typhoons. Witnesses and experts are brought to the stand to disprove misconceptions about climate change.
title: Earth's Trial: Debunking Climate Change Myths
